description:
I'm a highly skilled Control & Robotics Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing 
    innovative solutions for demanding robotic and fluid dynamic environments. My expertise includes system modelling, 
    algorithm design, software engineering, simulation, and optimization of dynamic systems. I possess natural problem-solving
    abilities and excellent communication skills, making me an asset to any team.
skills: Systems Engineering Practises (from Use Cases to requirements to architecture to implementation, verification and validation)
detailOrQuote: The passion to improve never ceases.
